name: Alohar Mobile Inc.
overview:
Alohar Mobile has developed an ambient sensing & location platform that enables developers to build a whole new class of mobile applications that understand a user’s behavior automatically and provide highly customized services to the user at the right time and right place.

Alohar Mobile’s philosophy is to enable your smartphone to become your intelligent personal assistant - a Predictive Siri. Apps built on the platform understand mobile user behavior based on patent-pending persistent sensing technologies. These apps will know what the user needs before he even asks, and will offer suggestions or recommendations in a predictive fashion.

Alohar’s platform powers all kinds of Android and iOS apps, such as health, fitness, safety, games, social networking, lifestyle, mobile-local-commerce, dating, and shopper loyalty apps.
